com.uploadcare.api
Class Client

java.lang.Object
  com.uploadcare.api.Client

public class Client
extends Object

Uploadcare API client. Provides simple access to File and Account resources.

See Also:
File, Account

Constructor Summary

          Initializes a client with custom access keys and simple authentication.

Constructor Detail

Client

public Client(String publicKey,
              String privateKey)
Initializes a client with custom access keys and simple authentication.

Parameters:
publicKey - Public key
privateKey - Private key

Client

public Client(String publicKey,
              String privateKey,
              boolean simpleAuth,
              RequestHelperProvider requestHelperProvider)
Initializes a client with custom access keys. Can use simple or secure authentication.

Parameters:
publicKey - Public key
privateKey - Private key
simpleAuth - If false, HMAC-based authentication is used
requestHelperProvider - Should be null to use DefaultRequestHelperProvider
Method Detail

demoClient

public static Client demoClient()
Creates a client with demo credentials. Useful for tests and anonymous access. Warning! Do not use in production. All demo account files are eventually purged.

Returns:
A demo client

getPublicKey

public String getPublicKey()
Returns the public key.

Returns:
Public key

getPrivateKey

public String getPrivateKey()
Returns the private key.

Returns:
Private key

isSimpleAuth

public boolean isSimpleAuth()
Returns true, if simple authentication is used.

Returns:
true, if simple authentication is used, false otherwise

getRequestHelper

public RequestHelper getRequestHelper()

getAccount

public Account getAccount()
Requests account data from the API.

Returns:
Account resource

getFile

public File getFile(String fileId)
Requests file data.

Parameters:
fileId - Resource UUID
Returns:
File resource

getFiles

public List<File> getFiles()
Requests all uploaded files for the current account.

Returns:
File resource list

deleteFile

public void deleteFile(String fileId)
Marks a file as deleted.

Parameters:
fileId - Resource UUID

saveFile

public void saveFile(String fileId)
Marks a file as saved. This has to be done for all files you want to keep. Unsaved files are eventually purged.

Parameters:
fileId - Resource UUID
